doc.title: (Stories from) The Land of Cain
doc.plot: Canada in a time of flu, chronicling a journey from Batoche in Saskatchewan to the Plains of Abraham at Quebec: two decisive sites upon which the fragile foundations of Canada were constructed. The journey breaks off in polyphonic reveries on home, histories, and stories from the road; moving forward through the landscape, drifting off in memory.
